alert.note: Alert for Grande Ronde Valley (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 17 at 7:38AM PST until December 19 at 3:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 3 PM PST TUESDAY FOR LADD AND PYLES CANYONS... * WHAT...South winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts around 50 mph expected for the southern Grande Ronde Valley near Ladd and Pyles Canyons. * WHERE...Southern Grande Ronde Valley. * WHEN...From 4 PM this afternoon to 3 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
